title: Oriental Ramen Broccoli ColeslawCrunchy Broccoli Coleslaw
directions: Before opening noodles, crush into 1 inch pieces. Open packages and set aside flavor packets.
Place noodles in bottom of large serving bowl. Top noodles with broccoli slaw, then sprinkle with almonds and sunflower kernels, and green onions.
In a separate bowl combine sugar, oil, vinegar, and flavor packets from noodles. Pour over slaw, cover and chill up to 24 hours.
In a medium size bowl mix broccoli slaw, drained pineapple tidbits, grated carrot and craisins.
In another snall bowl mix dressing ingredients. Pour over slaw mixture. Toss to blend.
Let marinate at least 2 hours before serving. Sprinkle almonds on top prior to serving.
